name: EarthObservatory
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: earth observatory
des:
Do you want to enjoy the magnificent astronomical image provided by NASA every day?

With Earth Observatory you can see it comfortably and quickly in your Alexa with integrated screen.

We are working to add new features every day to the Skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
